functionality.name: Admin Menu Management
functionality.description: A feature to manage weekly menus for users, view summaries, export data, and customize menu views.

requirements.description: The system must allow administrators to view and edit the weekly menu for each user, including the type of dish assigned for each day.
The system must provide a detailed overview of menu assignments by company, user, and type of dish.
The system must enable the export of menu information as a PDF.
The system must display summary statistics of the number of dishes by type and day for quick analysis.
The system must allow filtering by company and detailed view options (e.g., per person or totals).
The system must enable adding new entries for menu assignments.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign menu items to users for each day of the week so that everyoneâ€™s preferences are accommodated.

tasks.description: Design the UI to assign menu items for each user per day.
Implement functionality to save menu assignments to the backend.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to edit existing menu assignments for users to handle changes in preferences or errors.

tasks.description: Create an edit menu UI to modify existing assignments.
Add API logic to update menu assignments dynamically.

epics.description: Provide summary views for menu statistics.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to view a summary of the number of dishes by type and day to monitor demand and trends.

tasks.description: Design the UI for displaying dish counts by type and day.
Implement backend calculations for dish count summaries.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to filter the menu summary by company to analyze data for specific teams.

tasks.description: Add filters to the summary view for selecting specific companies.
Ensure the filtered data is displayed dynamically in the summary.

epics.description: Allow export and sharing of menu data.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to export the menu details to a PDF to share it with others easily.

tasks.description: Add a button to export menu data to PDF format.
Implement backend logic for generating PDF files.

epics.description: Enable filtering and customization of menu details.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to filter the menu view by individual users or totals for easier navigation and reporting.

tasks.description: Create filters for switching between per-person and total menu views.
Implement logic to update menu details dynamically based on filter selections.
